scripts.rename: node -e "require('fs').rename('_book', 'docs', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.copy_cname: node -e "require('fs').copyFile('CNAME', 'docs/CNAME', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully copied!') })"
scripts.start: yarn honkit && yarn rename && yarn copy_cname
scripts.build: yarn honkit && yarn clean && yarn rename && yarn copy_cname
